sentences.en: And then when England went out, I found it even more frustrating.
sentences.cn: 当英格兰被淘汰后, 我发现伤好象更加难受.

sentences.en: Cherie: I know. It can be really frustrating at times.
sentences.cn: 谢里: 我很明白. 有时候这真令人感到无可奈何.

sentences.en: I felt sorry for him and his colleagues — it must have been so frustrating for them.
sentences.cn: 我为他和他的同事们感到难过——这件事一定让他们感到非常沮丧。

sentences.en: I find it frustrating that I cannot speak other languages.
sentences.cn: 我不会说别的语言,感到惘然若失.

sentences.en: I found the delays intensely frustrating.
sentences.cn: 我觉得这些延误极其令人沮丧.

sentences.en: I'm pretty desk-bound, which is very frustrating.
sentences.cn: 我基本上一直需要伏案工作，这真让人沮丧。

sentences.en: It must be terribly frustrating to lobby and get absolutely nowhere.
sentences.cn: 游说未取得一点结果，一定让人非常沮丧。

sentences.en: It was a demeaning and ultimately frustrating experience.
sentences.cn: 那是一次有失颜面并且令人沮丧至极的经历.

sentences.en: Kevin: I am, I've been having a very frustrating day so far.
sentences.cn: 凯文: 对啊, 今天一直都很不顺利.

sentences.en: My job can be very frustrating sometimes.
sentences.cn: 有时候我的工作令人很沮丧。

sentences.en: One of the most frustrating experiences in life is to be stranded without proper tools.
sentences.cn: 人生最令人沮丧的经历之一,就是处于窘境而无用以自拔的适当工具.

sentences.en: The current situation is very frustrating for us.
sentences.cn: 当前的情形令我们十分灰心。

sentences.en: The most frustrating ones seem to occur for no reason at all.
sentences.cn: 最令人沮丧的似乎是那些“凭空”出现的阻塞.

sentences.en: This is an immensely frustrating experience for the student.
sentences.cn: 对于学生来说，这是非常令人沮丧的经历。

sentences.en: This is so frustrating! How can you treat me like this?
sentences.cn: 真是令我失望. 你怎么能这样对我?

sentences.en: War was grueling and oppressive and frustrating and uncomfortable, but one had friends.
sentences.cn: 战争虽然严酷,暴虐, 富有破坏性,给人带来灾难,但它却使人从中得到知心朋友.

sentences.en: We spent a frustrating five minutes while the pilot warmed up the engines.
sentences.cn: 我们沮丧地等了5分钟，让飞行员预热引擎。

trans.tran_cn: 产生挫折的，使人沮丧的，令人泄气的
trans.tran_en: making you feel annoyed, upset, or impatient because you cannot do what you want to do

trans.tran_cn: 使不成功( frustrate的现在分词 )，挫败，使受挫折，令人沮丧
